title: Ambient Soundtracks
description: More than an hour of epic emotional soundscapes for various environments with additional stems for extra flexibility.
longDescription:
Preview on SoundCloud


Ambient Soundtracks is a versatile collection of 24 compositions thematically inspired by science fiction movies and games. Tracks were composed forÂ wasteland, space, horror, industrial, interstellar, and post apocalyptic environments.

The combination of melodic themes with drone-like ambiences makes this pack suitable for in-game exploration as well as cinematic or emotional scenes.

Soundtracks were composed in similar keys and have dark and moody sound which allows for seamless sequential combination. In addition, every track is subdivided into layers which provides more options and variety so the pack might be used as a construction kit.
technicalDetails:
Each track features additional atmospheric and melodic stems (layers). Atmospheric layer creates background soundscape of the track. Melodic layer contains all of melodic movement of the track. Tracks "Dunes", "Civilization" and "Dark Secrets" also have percussion elements, which are rendered into separate percussion stems.
